CustomField.description: The subject details to display against a delivery WOLI. Returns the default quantity to reflect actual amounts as they are recorded. Used to provide task detail on the mobile device in flow TDF_Collect_Deliver.
CustomField.formula: 'Deliver ' & Product__r.Name & ' (' & TEXT(Default_Quantity__c) & ')' & IF(ISBLANK(Collect_From_Work_Order__c),'', ' collected from ' & Collect_From_Work_Order__r.Location.Name) & IF(ISBLANK(Deliver_To_Dock_Number__c),'',' to dock ' & Deliver_To_Dock_Number__c)
CustomField.label: Deliver Details
